CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 6, 1957, pg. 16 reads: "1. The Carnation booth was represented by John Ruffing, Mrs. Isabell L. Gordon and J.W. Pile who passed out samples of the Carnation Instant Chocolate drink to all visitors"
TitMainTitle: John Ruffing, Isabell L. Gordon, and J.W. Pile standing in Carnation Milk booth, in Syria Mosque for the 1957 Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair
